about_the_game:
Fraternal Love

A story of redemption, following an undead prince seeking justice. Will he be able to save the kingdom from his brother's maleficent scheme?

A New Take on Metroidvania

Fallen Prince is an atmospheric, combat-focused metroidvania game. It combines retro elements (e.g. no inventory, pixel graphics) with a modern, souls-like combat system (adapted to the needs of a platformer). Our hero is a warrior, risen from the dead. Wielding just a shield and a sword, you must help him find and defeat his brother, after overcoming his undead spawnlings and the many obstacles present in this wretched, barren land. The fate of the kingdom lies in your hands!

Development Team

Eridanus Games was formed on account of a 'Game Development' online course, provided by the Hellenic Open University. Fallen Prince was conceptualized and developed in the span of three months (on zero budget), and it is also our first joined effort—so please go easy on us! By purchasing this game, you encourage us to work on adding new features and content. Feel free to share the game if you enjoyed playing it. We appreciate your kind feedback!

name: Fallen Prince

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 Recommended

short_description: Fallen Prince is an atmospheric combat-focused metroidvania with retro elements. Explore a bleak undead zone, hone your skills and rid the kingdom from your brother's vile sorcery.
